body: query {shippingreceiptbycustomerlist (customer: "24f7c851-29d4-4af9-87c5-0298fa74c689") { shippingreceipts { id, status, tracking { carrier, id }, fulfillment_provider { id, name, provider { ... on Hashtag { name, username, password, threepl_customer_id, threepl_key } ... on ThreePL { name, username, password, threepl_customer_id, threepl_key, threepl_id, threepl_facility_id } ... on ShipStation { name, api_key, api_secret } ... on TestFulfillmentProvider { name } }, created_at, updated_at }, fulfillment_provider_reference, history {created_at, status, detail}, created_at, updated_at }, pagination { count, end_cursor, has_next_page } } }
